effect: Damage weapon armor or shield (ignore hardness)
Entangled in equipment (standard action to free self)
fling weapon (1d8 direction; 1d20 distance;damage first person hit; 1-5 damage self!)

title: backblast

title: critical mistake
effect: the attack hits you and is a critical threat

title: out of position
effect: you cannot use this attack again

title: mind drain
effect: take int wis or cha damage

title: off-balance
effect: take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls

title: broke a nail
effect: take damage; cannot use thi attack again until healed

title: power drain
effect: randomly lose one prepared spell or spell lost

title: spilled ammo
effect: drop all ammo from active ammo container

title: just a taste
effect: hit an ally adjacent to target

title: distance rift
effect: teleported to the nearest square adjacent to the target

title: fling
effect: you drop your weapon and it lands 1d6 squares away in a random directoin

title: reflection
effect: spell hits you instead of target

title: tangled
effect: entangled in gear (standard to free self)

title: I told you it was sharp
twisted
effect: entangled in gear (standard to free self)

title: apprentice move
effect: reroll attack against creature nearest target (excluding self)

title: bruised ego
effect: can attack no other target (or until target is dead)

title: monster rift
effect: spell is converted into hostile summon monster spell of same level

title: too much stuff!
effect: entangled in gear (standard to free self)

title: errant aim
effect: reroll attack against creature nearest the target (excluding self)

title: snapped string
effect: if this attack was made with a bow or corssbow, the string breaks (fixing takes 1d3 rounds)

title: tied up
effect: entangled in own gear (standard to free self)

title: sorry
effect: attack hits ally adjacent to you or target

title: catch your breath
effect: can only take move action next round

title: wrong weapon
effect: if you made a thrown attack, you throw a random object from your gear

title: got too close
effect: your attack hits but you provoke a free grapple

title: you made him stronger
effect: target gains +8 enhancement bonus to strength

title: all or nothing
effect: -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

title: surrounded by foes
effect: hit ally within reach and is critical threat

title: insecure
effect: -1 penlaty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

title: lost grip
effect: can only take a move action next round

title: battered
effect: -2 penalty on all skill checks and saves

title: unexpected blast
effect: spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you (except self)

title: shot your foot
effect: dex damage and speed reduced by half until healed

title: side effect
effect: one of your magic items fains a permanent random flaw

title: no way
effect: your attack hits but deals minimum damage

title: what are the odds?
effect: if you made a thrown attack, you hit the target, but the weapon ends up in the targets possession.

title: whirwind of shame
effect: deal damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target

title: jumbled components
effect: can only take a move action next round

title: in the line of fire
effect: attack hits nearest ally and is critical threat

title: ferocious fumble
effect: attack his an ally within reach and is a critical threat.

title: the magic is gone
effect: -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a ciritical hit

title: hand it over
effect: target gains possession of your weapon

title: not my pony
effect: attack nearest allied animal or mount

title: caster's block
effect: you cannot cast this spell for 24 hours

title: bent
effect: -4 penalty on attack rolls until this weapon is repaired

title: double miss
effect: expend double the ammunition for this attack

title: caught your attack
effect: target may attempt to trip, shove, or overrun you

title: better to give
effect: damage self using targets str modifier

title: weapon jam
effect: used projectile weapon becomes jammed and does not function. Spend standard action to clear.

title: ingrown nail
effect: -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

title: bad alignment
effect: this weapon gains -4 penalty on attack rolls until repairs

title: he bit your fist
effect: target deals bite damage to you

title: poor trade
effect: attack hits, but you lose a spell of slot of the highest available level (your choice)

title: stuck
effect: weapon is stuck in a neaby surface. DC20 strength check to free it.

title: spell shield
effect: target gains SR equal to 11 + your CL

title: aim carefully next time
effect: for the next 3 rounds it requires a full-round action to make a single attack

title: brutal collision
effect: your attack hits, but you are stunned

title: power transfer
effect: the highest-level spell effect on you is transferred to the target

title: don't hit me
effect: take an additional -2 penalty on ranged attack for each ally in melee with target

title: pinched nerve
effect: maximum reach is reduced to 5 feet

title: mental slip
effect: target may give you one suggestion

title: phantom wind
effect: you compensate for a breeze that isnt there. -2 penalty on attack rolls.

title: overthink it
effect: target's armor and natural armor bonuses are doubled against you

title: recoil
effect: fall prone 5 feet away from target

title: hangnail
effect: you cannot use claw, clam, or unarmed attacks

title: magical vacuum
effect: 1d3 spell effects on you are randomly dispelled

title: overcompensate
effect: targets with cover gain additoinal +4 AC bonus against you

title: that tastes awful!
effect: if this attack was a bite attack, become nauseated

title: energy transger
effect: lose one randomly determined spell or spell slot. Target may cast this spell next round.

title: you meant to do that
effect: move 10 feet in a random direction, provoking AoOs normally

title: not the weak point
effect: deal damage to enemy armor equal to strength bonus, and take that much damage. You cannot use this attack again

title: how did that happen?
effect: stinking cloud appears, centered on you

title: seeing double
effect: all your attacks gain 50% miss chance

title: blastoff
effect: thrown 1d6*10 feet into the air (or random direction if flying)

title: punt
effect: weapon flied 2d6 squares in random direction

title: unintentional move
effect: move 10 feet in a random direction, provoking AoOs normally

title: stinging failure
effect: take nonlethal equal to str bonus. -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack

title: cursed
effect: -4 penalty on all d20 rolls until removed.

title: overthrow
effect: if attack was made with thrown weapon, weapon travels 5x its normal range in a random direction.

title: magical smack down
effect: automatically fail next saving throw attempted

title: tunnel vision
effect: flat footed, +1 bonus on attack rolls

title: wild magic
effect: roll 2x on rod of wonder table

title: broken haft
effect: weapon loses reach and has -4 attack penalty until repaired.

title: all thumbs
effect: lose dex bonus on attack rolls

title: jam a finger
effect: your target takes normal damage. You take double the damage dealt.
